issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
UPDATE/DELETE on MM tables fails with 
"FAILED: SemanticException Error 10297: Attempt to do update or delete on table tpch.tbl_default_mm that is not transactional". 
This is invalid since the MM table is transactional.
fields.summary: Invalid error messages for UPDATE/DELETE on insert-only transactional tables
